name: Nicolas Hannett
description: I’m the kind of man that if you’re stranded on the road side, in the middle of the night and need me, I will be there for you. If you’re in the office and can’t get away cause there’s nobody to prepare your lunch, I’m there for You. That’s my word to you and I keep by my word and have thus far. I like every of your hobbies and this are my hobbies guess you like them, I have a great sense of humor and personality. I’m romantic sensual and passionate. have few interests including long romantic walk, holding hands and sneaking in a kiss with a partner anywhere from the park to the beach. I like cooking, enjoy watching sport either on TV or at a stadium Other interests are playing golf, camping and boating. I enjoy cuddling while watching a movie or just having a coffee and talking about whatever comes to mind. I want a woman that have sense of humor and curious about new things. A woman that can share both old or new experiences. A woman who believes that a true intimate partner looks out for the wife voice.
